# Business Plugins

# Setup

## Python

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import semantic_kernel as sk
from semantic_kernel.connectors.ai.open_ai import AzureChatCompletion, OpenAIChatCompletion
from IPython.display import display, Markdown
```
:::


## Kernel

::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
kernel = sk.Kernel()

api_key, org_id = sk.openai_settings_from_dot_env()

kernel.add_text_completion_service(
    "openai", OpenAIChatCompletion("gpt-3.5-turbo", api_key, org_id))

print("A kernel is now ready.")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
A kernel is now ready.
```
:::
:::


# Business Plugins

## Business goals

1. Grow the existing business
2. Save money and time
3. Add completely new business
4. Prepare for the unknown

## Plugins directory

## Activate plugins

::: {.cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
pluginsDirectory = "../plugins-sk"

pluginBT = kernel.import_semantic_skill_from_directory(
    pluginsDirectory, "BusinessThinking")
```
:::


# Cost Efficiency 

## Input strengths and weaknesses

::: {.cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
strengths = ["Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards", "Owner trained in Sicily at some of the best pizzerias",
             "Strong local reputation", "Prime location on university campus"]

weaknesses = ["High staff turnover", "Floods in the area damaged the seating areas that are in need of repair",
              "Absence of popular calzones from menu", "Negative reviews from younger demographic for lack of hip ingredients"]
```
:::


## Context

::: {.cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_context = kernel.create_new_context()

my_context['input'] = 'makes pizzas'
my_context['strengths'] = ", ".join(strengths)
my_context['weaknesses'] = ", ".join(weaknesses)
```
:::


## Run kernel with cost efficiency plugin

::: {.cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
costefficiency_result = await kernel.run_async(pluginBT["SeekCostEfficiency"], input_context=my_context)
```
:::


## Output

::: {.cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
costefficiency_str = str(
    "### ‚ú® Suggestions for how to gain cost efficiencies\n" + str(costefficiency_result))
```
:::


. . .

::: {.cell output-location='slide' execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
display(Markdown(costefficiency_str))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
### ‚ú® Suggestions for how to gain cost efficiencies
| Title | Strength | Weakness | Description |
| ----- | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| Streamline operations | Strong local reputation | High staff turnover | Implementing efficient processes and systems to streamline operations and reduce the need for excessive staff turnover. This can include automating certain tasks, improving training programs, and implementing effective scheduling systems. |
| Renovate seating areas | Prime location on university campus | Floods damaging seating areas | Investing in repairing and renovating the seating areas to attract more customers and enhance the dining experience. This can include finding cost-effective solutions for repairs, redesigning the seating layout for better space utilization, and creating a more inviting ambiance. |
| Expand menu with popular calzones | Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards | Absence of popular calzones from menu | Adding popular calzones to the menu to cater to customer preferences and increase sales. This can involve market research to identify popular calzone flavors, sourcing cost-effective ingredients, and promoting the new menu items effectively. |
:::
:::


# Business Strategy

## Input opportunities and threats

::: {.cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
opportunities = ["Untapped catering potential", "Growing local tech startup community",
                 "Unexplored online presence and order capabilities", "Upcoming annual food fair"]

threats = ["Competition from cheaper pizza businesses nearby", "There's nearby street construction that will impact foot traffic",
           "Rising cost of cheese will increase the cost of pizzas", "No immediate local regulatory changes but it's election season"]
```
:::


## Import plugin

::: {.cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
pluginBT = kernel.import_semantic_skill_from_directory(
    pluginsDirectory, "BusinessThinking")
```
:::


## Context

::: {.cell execution_count=11}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_context = kernel.create_new_context()

my_context['input'] = 'makes pizzas'
my_context['strengths'] = ", ".join(strengths)
my_context['weaknesses'] = ", ".join(weaknesses)
my_context['opportunities'] = ", ".join(opportunities)
my_context['threats'] = ", ".join(threats)
```
:::


## Run kernel 

::: {.cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
bizstrat_result = await kernel.run_async(pluginBT["BasicStrategies"], input_context=my_context)
```
:::


## Output

::: {.cell execution_count=13}
``` {.python .cell-code}
bizstrat_str = "## ‚ú® Business strategy thinking based on SWOT analysis\n" + \
    str(bizstrat_result)
```
:::


. . .

::: {.cell output-location='slide' execution_count=14}
``` {.python .cell-code}
display(Markdown(bizstrat_str))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
## ‚ú® Business strategy thinking based on SWOT analysis
### Building on strengths can immediately improve the business

| Title | Strength | Weakness | Description |
| ----- | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| Expand menu with popular calzones | Unique garlic pizza recipe that wins top awards | Absence of popular calzones from menu | Add popular calzones to the menu to attract customers who are looking for variety and expand the customer base. |
| Improve seating areas damaged by floods | Strong local reputation | Floods in the area damaged the seating areas that are in need of repair | Repair and enhance the seating areas to provide a comfortable and inviting environment for customers, which can help improve customer satisfaction and attract more customers. |
| Enhance online presence and marketing | Prime location on university campus | Negative reviews from younger demographic for lack of hip ingredients | Develop a strong online presence, including a user-friendly website and active social media accounts, to target the younger demographic and showcase the unique aspects of the business, such as the owner's training in Sicily and the award-winning garlic pizza recipe. This can help attract new customers and improve the perception of the business among the younger demographic. |

### Taking advantage of opportunities whenever possible

| Title | Opportunity | Description |
| ----- | -------- | ----------- |
| Launch catering services | Untapped catering potential | Tap into the untapped catering potential by offering catering services for events and gatherings, such as university functions, corporate meetings, and private parties. This can provide a new revenue stream and expand the reach of the business beyond the regular dine-in customers. |
| Develop online ordering capabilities | Unexplored online presence and order capabilities | Develop a user-friendly online ordering system to cater to the growing demand for online food delivery and takeout. This can attract tech-savvy customers and provide convenience, especially for the university community and the local tech startup community. |
| Participate in the upcoming annual food fair | Upcoming annual food fair | Showcase the unique garlic pizza recipe and other offerings at the upcoming annual food fair to attract new customers, generate buzz, and potentially secure catering opportunities or partnerships with other local businesses. |

### Building resilience to threats is always a good idea

| Title | Threat | Description |
| ----- | -------- | ----------- |
| Implement cost-saving measures | Rising cost of cheese will increase the cost of pizzas | Identify and implement cost-saving measures, such as optimizing ingredient usage, negotiating better deals with suppliers, and streamlining operations, to mitigate the impact of rising cheese costs on the overall profitability of the business. |
| Diversify customer base | Competition from cheaper pizza businesses nearby | Implement targeted marketing strategies to attract and retain customers who value the unique aspects of the business, such as the award-winning garlic pizza recipe and the owner's training in Sicily. This can help differentiate the business from cheaper competitors and maintain a loyal customer base. |
| Stay updated on local regulatory changes | No immediate local regulatory changes but it's election season | Stay informed about potential regulatory changes that may impact the business, especially during election seasons. This can help the business proactively adapt and comply with any new regulations, minimizing disruptions and potential penalties. |
:::
:::
